text: The Jurong Lark Connector is one way to go to Jurong Lake Gardens from Clementi.  It’s relatively easy trail and safe.  Another way would be to cycle along Boon Lay Way to Jurong Lake Gardens from Clementi directly.  The only downside is that there are more pedestrians to avoid along the way.
I like to go there for a stroll. Not very crowded…is just a nice small park.
Loved it.. And participated in small game.. Nice trained birds and animals.. Well treated.
More lighting will be appreciated especially after 8pm
The Jurong park connector at st 42, the canal is full of debris not cleared since covid-19 till now...
